subtitle: Cheif Guest
title: Meet Our Esteemed Chief Guest
description: Lt Col Ranjitsingh Nalawade, Founder & Chairman of Yoddhaa Defence Institute and Strategic Advisor at PowerAm Deftech Ltd, brings a wealth of military and strategic expertise. An Army Air Defence veteran, Lt Col Nalawade has dedicated his career to shaping India's defense capabilities. Through Yoddhaa Defence Institute, he continues to train and mentor the next generation of defense professionals. His leadership and vision in defense strategy are widely recognized, and his commitment to national security and preparedness makes him a prominent figure in the defense sector.
